org.apache.nlpcraft.client

Interface NCUser


  • public interface NCUser
    User record descriptor.
    See Also:
    NCClient.getUser(Long, String), NCClient.getAllUsers()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAvatarUrl()
      Gets optional user avatar URl.
      String getEmail()
      Gets user email.
      String getExternalId()
      Gets external "on-behalf-of" user ID.
      String getFirstName()
      Gets user first name.
      long getId()
      Gets user ID.
      String getLastName()
      Gets user last name.
      Map<String,String> getProperties()
      Gets properties.
      boolean isAdmin()
      Gets whether or not this user has administrative privileges.
